title: Is anyone else having problems with the load time on PBE?
body: the PBE updated this afternoon and my client has been SLOWLY putting the updates on... it's been since what, 4:30? and it's only at 30%. Is anyone else having this problem?

replies.body: As long as it's still patching and you aren't seeing any errors, it's best to let the patcher finish its thing to avoid any corrupted files. If you feel like it's downloading much slower than it should be, take a look over our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can clear up any issues that are preventing you from getting your normal download speeds.

I have this problem. I started it today around 5:00 and it JUST NOW got to 49% then stopped and said there was a problem patching and it closed out of the client! My internet is pretty slow to begin with but I dont know why It'd have a problem patching.
